Module VirusSimulationFX
Package GUI

Class Map

java.lang.Object
GUI.Map
public class Map extends Object
Class representing the map in the simulation. This class handles the creation and management of the map, including countries and their states.

      Height - the height of the map
      Radius - the radius of the hexagonal tiles
